[Inauguration|true] of free zone in Dubai for e-commerce

input_text: lu factuality: Dubai 10-28 (FP) - Dubai's Crown Prince Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum inaugurated a free zone for e-commerce today, called Dubai Internet City.
target_text: Dubai 10-28 (FP) - Dubai's Crown Prince Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum [inaugurated|true] a free zone for e-commerce today, called Dubai Internet City.

input_text: lu factuality: The preliminary stages of the project, the only one of its kind according to its designers, are estimated at $200 million.
target_text: The preliminary stages of the [project|true], the only one of its kind [according|true] to its designers, are [estimated|true] at $200 million.

input_text: lu factuality: Sheikh Mohamed, who is also the Defense Minister of the United Arab Emirates, announced at the inauguration ceremony that "we want to make Dubai a new trading center."
target_text: Sheikh Mohamed, who [is|true] also the Defense [Minister|true] of the United Arab Emirates, [announced|true] at the inauguration [ceremony|true] that "we [want|false] to [make|unknown] Dubai a new trading center."

input_text: lu factuality: The minister, who has his own website, also said: "I want Dubai to be the best place in the world for state-of-the-art technology companies."
target_text: The minister, who [has|true] his own [website|true], also [said|true]: "I [want|false] Dubai to [be|unknown] the best place in the world for state-of-the-art technology companies."

input_text: lu factuality: He said companies engaged in e-commerce would be able to set up offices, employ staff and own equipment in the open zone, including fully-owned foreign companies.
target_text: He [said|true] companies [engaged|false] in e-commerce [would|false] [be|unknown] able to [set|false] up offices, [employ|false] staff and [own|false] equipment in the open zone, [including|false] fully-owned foreign companies.

input_text: lu factuality: The e-commerce free zone is situated in north Dubai, near the industrial free zone in Jebel Ali, the top regional and tenth international leading area in container transit.
target_text: The e-commerce free zone is [situated|true] in north Dubai, near the industrial free zone in Jebel Ali, the top regional and tenth international leading area in container transit.

input_text: lu factuality: The inauguration of Dubai Internet City coincides with the opening of an annual IT show in Dubai, the Gulf Information Technology Exhibition (Gitex), the biggest in the Middle East.
target_text: The [inauguration|true] of Dubai Internet City [coincides|true] with the [opening|true] of an annual IT [show|true] in Dubai, the Gulf Information Technology Exhibition (Gitex), the biggest in the Middle East.

Launching the Electronics Free Trade Zone in Dubai
target_text:
<DOC docid="artb_004" sysid="ahg">

[Launching|true] the Electronics Free Trade Zone in Dubai

input_text: lu factuality: Dubai 01-82 (AFP) - Crown Prince of Dubai Al Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoom crown prince of Dubai launched today, i.e. on Saturday, an electronics free e-trade zone which has been named "Dubai Internet City"
target_text: Dubai 01-82 (AFP) - Crown Prince of Dubai Al Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoom crown prince of Dubai [launched|true] today, i.e. on Saturday, an electronics free e-trade zone which has been [named|true] "Dubai Internet City"

input_text: lu factuality: The cost in the first stage of this unique project is estimated at 200 million dollars.
target_text: The [cost|true] in the first stage of this unique [project|true] is [estimated|true] at 200 million dollars.

input_text: lu factuality: Sheikh Mohammed, who is also the UAE Defence Minister, said during the launching ceremony "we wish to make Dubai a center of modern economy".
target_text: Sheikh Mohammed, who [is|true] also the UAE Defence [Minister|true], [said|true] during the launching [ceremony|true] "we [wish|false] to [make|unknown] Dubai a [center|false] of modern economy".

input_text: lu factuality: The minister who has a personal website on the internet, further said that he wanted Dubai to become the best place in the world for the advanced (hitech) technological companies.
target_text: The minister who [has|true] a personal [website|true] on the internet, further [said|true] that he [wanted|false] Dubai to [become|unknown] the best [place|false] in the world for the advanced (hitech) technological companies.

input_text: lu factuality: He said that it would be possible for the companies working in the electronic trade sector to make Dubai their headquarters, and to establish offices here and provide employment and own machinery in the zone opened to companies fully owned by the foreigners.
target_text: He [said|true] that it [would|false] [be|unknown] possible for the companies [working|false] in the electronic trade sector to [make|false] Dubai their headquarters, and to [establish|false] offices here and [provide|false] employment and own [machinery|false] in the [zone|false] [opened|false] to companies fully [owned|false] by the foreigners.

input_text: lu factuality: The electronic trade free trade zone is situated in the north of Dubai, close to the free industrial zone in Jabal Ali Mountain, an area which is considered to be the first in the country, and tenth in the world for transit movement.
target_text: The electronic trade free trade zone is [situated|true] in the north of Dubai, close to the free industrial zone in Jabal Ali Mountain, an area which is [considered|true] to [be|false] the [first|true] in the country, and tenth [in|true] the world for transit movement.

input_text: lu factuality: Launching 'Dubai Internet city ' coincided with the opening of the annual information fair in Dubai which is considered to be the biggest in the Middle East - Gulf Information Technology Getix.'
target_text: [Launching|true] 'Dubai Internet city ' [coincided|true] with the [opening|true] of the annual [information|true] fair in Dubai which is [considered|true] to [be|false] the [biggest|true] in the Middle East - Gulf Information Technology Getix.'
